args:
You were so against it at first, and yet here
you are putting on a costume of your own
volition. Have you finally changed your
mind about Halloween?
Well, it IS the last day of the party.\nAnd besides, he asked me to.
And who might this mysterious ＂he＂ be?
Easy now! You're still not all better yet,\nso no running!
I have no idea how to thank you, sir.
Oh, there's no need. I'm simply glad he's\nrecovered enough to enjoy the festivities\nwith the rest of us.
I truly can't thank you enough.
Thank you, Mister Sylas! I'm so excited\nI get to be at the Halloween party!
Actually, I do have a treat for you.\nBut sadly, it isn't candy.
Candy would be a bit much for you right\nnow, so I've prepared scented candles\nthat smell like sweet treats instead.
Yes. Try to just enjoy the scent for now,\nand then when you're better you can\nhave all the sweets you want.
We'll be on our way now.
Seems like someone's soft on kids.
Oh, pishposh! No need to be defensive.
More importantly, you've saved yet\nanother life.
...I think I understand why you told me\nto enjoy Halloween now.
Oh? And why might that be?
Halloween was an excuse to get me\nto interact with my former patients.
Knowing they were saved by my aromatics\ngave me the strength I needed to defeat\nthe powerlessness I felt.
That's what you were after, Doctor.\nWasn't it?
The path to completing your healing\naromatic will not be an easy one, my boy.

In the course of your research, you will
come to know even more death—and
with your kind nature, this will likely
make you curse your own powerlessness.
When that happens, I want you to\nremember all of the smiles you saw\nduring this party.
Your aromatics have already saved lives.\nYou are making progress, even if it's only\na little at a time.
You've long ago learned how to turn\nyour sadness into strength.
So from now on, try to gain strength from\nthe happiness of those you've saved.
You can, for that is the essence of the\nperfect healing aromatic you seek.
Thank you for all you've taught me, Doctor.
I will forever remember your lessons\nas I continue my research.
That straightforwardness and diligence\nof yours is the same as it ever was.
So please don't let the memory of my\ndeath hold you back any longer,\nlittle Sylas.
Wha—?! Luca! Laranoa! Let go of me!\nI must finish talking to the doctor!
Aw, boo! He figured us out right away.\nGuess I'll have to work on changing my\nvoice up a bit.
Don't go covering someone's eyes when\nthey're in the middle of a conversation!
Yes, the doctor! The old human who was\nstanding right next to me!
Uh, you've been alone since the moment\nwe spotted you, dude.
What...? But what about the doctor?
I once had a grandson who loved\nstrawberries and was easily frightened,\nmuch like yourself.
So please don't let the memory of my\ndeath hold you back any longer,\nlittle Sylas.
*sniff* I don't care if it's Halloween.\nThat kind of prank isn't funny at all.
You know what? I bet that really\nWAS your grandfather, Sylas.
I don't know how you could actually\nbelieve such an absurd story...
Yeah, but I do! You too, right, Luca?
Hey, there's no way those tears were fake!\nThat's all the proof I need.
What does that have to do with it?
Halloween ain't just some harvest festival.
It's also the day when the dead\ncome to visit the living.
I bet your gramps was worried about you.
So it would seem—but I won't make him\nworry about me ever again.
For my grandfather has taught me the key\nto completing the healing aromatic.
What I don't get is why he chose to\ntake a human form.
Maybe he just wanted to surprise Sylas.\nI mean, it wouldn't be fun if he just came\nto visit like normal on Halloween, yeah?
That could indeed be the case. Unlike me,\nmy grandfather always enjoyed games.
So your grandpa gave you both a trick \nAND a treat? He's good at this!
Indeed, I would say he was even better\nthan you two when it came to pranks.
Oh, we are NOT taking that lying down.
Well, if it bothers you that much,\nwhy don't you show me how to do it?
I'm going to take a break from my research\ntonight so I can enjoy Halloween.
And there are a bunch of prankster kids\nout there who need a little bit of payback.\nSo what do you say?
Yeah! Now let's storm this party!
I will bestow happiness upon everyone!
(You can rest easy, Grandfather—I won't\nlet my sadness overwhelm me ever again.)
(And I won't give up until my healing\naromatic is complete!)
